description: This file defines an Redux Toolkit slice for managing UI state in a React application, including theme, loading indicator, modals, and notifications.

methods.name: setTheme
methods.description: Action to change the theme (light or dark).

methods.name: showGlobalLoading
methods.description: Action to show a global loading indicator.

methods.name: hideGlobalLoading
methods.description: Action to hide the global loading indicator.

methods.name: openModal
methods.description: Action to open a modal dialog with given properties.

methods.name: closeModal
methods.description: Action to close the currently open modal.

methods.name: pushNotification
methods.description: Action to add a new notification to the notifications list.

methods.name: removeNotification
methods.description: Action to remove a notification by its ID.
